about.title: About Me
about.content: Full Stack Developer who likes to write Frontend Code using JavaScript. Aspires to work as a Frontend Developer using Next and React JS. My technical skills include JavaScript, Java, React.js, Node.js, Spring Boot, MySQL, MongoDB, and Git.

about.title: Experience
about.content: I gained professional experience at OnGraph, where I worked as a Full Stack Developer with the MEAN stack. I holds M.Sc. in Computer Science from LJMU, where I received a merit for my thesis writing. Additionally, I completed a PG in Software Development from IIIT Bangalore, achieving a CGPA of 3.71 out of 4. My certifications include Next.js, Clean Code, User Interface Design, CSS, React.js, Node.js, Angular.js, and Web Development.

services.title: I develop backend API's using Node.js & Express.
I develop frontend apps using React.js.
Enthusiast in building full-stack apps with Next.js
I make high-quality designs using Figma.

testimonials.name: E-commerce App
testimonials.comment: Just a rather simple E-commerce Application, simulated payment and checkout pages using Stripe, database using Prisma built in session based user authentication.

testimonials.name: Task Manager
testimonials.comment: Huge full-stack application comprised of many technologies like Node JS & Express for backend API's, database is managed through MongoDB and Mongoose and React JS for the frontend of the application.

testimonials.name: Social Application
testimonials.comment: This is a basic prototype application that I am exprementing on developing a photo sharing like application, built with Next JS and also using Socket.io for real-time integration with the client and server.
